subject: This week's component news: $25,000+ in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

This week we've got $25,350 in new design and development competitions, and we're making the final preparations for next week's TopCoder Open.

====================================================
1. THIS WEEK'S COMPONENT PROJECTS

Design: $17,550 in total prizes.
* Java Diagram UML Sequence Elements Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events Security Adapter Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
* .NET Hierarchical Drop Down Control Version 1.0 ($900.00)
* Java Mobile RSS XML Parser Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Mobile HTTP Handler Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
* .NET Command Line XML Processor Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Extended DataGridView Version 1.2 ($800.00)
* .NET Constants Service Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java JSF Movable Panels Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET CSharp API Processor Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Database Constants Provider Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Function Expression Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Extended DataGridView Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* .NET Fax Manager Version 1.0 ($800.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

Development: $7,800 in total prizes.
* Java PreparedStatement Logger Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java JSF Flexible Radio Button Renderer Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET ASP.NET User Profile Control Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Simple Schedule Display Tag Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java SFTP Utility Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Object Factory Configuration API Plugin Version 1.0 ($200.00)
* Java Date Selector Tag Version 1.1 ($500.00)
* .NET Free Form Manager Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Named Query Factory Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* C++ Titan Segment Service Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113


====================================================
2. TC CHANNEL: MEET THE PAWESKAS

In case you haven't seen it, there's an interesting profile of argolite and AleaActaEst -- two of TopCoder's most successful component competitors -- in this month's TC Channel broadcast. Watch the episode online here (their segment starts around 8 minutes in): http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=media&d2=tcchannel&clip=ep2.


====================================================
3. SAVE THE DATE: TCO07 WEBCAST

Don't forget - you can watch the TopCoder Open finals live next week at the AOL(R) Developer site (http://dev.aol.com) on Friday, June 29. Coverage of the TCO07 finals from the Mirage Resort in Las Vegas begins at 21:00 GMT.

 
Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
